36#include "krb5_locl.h"
37
38static u_long table[256];
39
40#define CRC_GEN 0xEDB88320L
41
42KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION void KRB5_LIB_CALL
43_krb5_crc_init_table(void)
44{
45 static int flag = 0;
46 unsigned long crc, poly;
47 unsigned int i, j;
48
49 if(flag) return;
50 poly = CRC_GEN;
51 for (i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
52 crc = i;
53 for (j = 8; j > 0; j--) {
54 if (crc & 1) {
55 crc = (crc >> 1) ^ poly;
56 } else {
57 crc >>= 1;
58 }
59 }
60 table[i] = crc;
61 }
62 flag = 1;
63}
64
65KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION uint32_t KRB5_LIB_CALL
66_krb5_crc_update (const char *p, size_t len, uint32_t res)
67{
68 while (len--)
69 res = table[(res ^ *p++) & 0xFF] ^ (res >> 8);
70 return res & 0xFFFFFFFF;
71}
72
